entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expose VectorMask<T> to support generic masking for Vector<T> #74613
  • Update Third-party-notices file in 7.0 installers #74605
    7.0.0
  • NCL stress tests fail to build since ProductVersion update to 8.0.0 #74604
    8.0.0
  • Race condition on marshal-ilgen init #74603
    7.0.0
  • superpmi: `Method X is of low integrity` errors #74596
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'opcode == CEE_LDFLD && objType != nullptr' in 'ReturnTestsType:Return.LocalStructFieldByRef_Invalid_ReturnPtrToStack(Struct):byref:this' during 'Importation' #74593
    7.0.0
  • Native crash in `JIT.Regression` for `mono llvmfullaot Pri0 Runtime Tests Run Linux x64 release` #74588
  • Support for intrinsics with multiple execution engines with divergent capabilities #74587
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Re-enable passing arguments in SIMD registers #74583
    8.0.0
  • Consider disabling PendingConnectionTimeout if a ConnectTimeout is set #74581
  • source-build TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable don't flow through to the native scripts #74577
  • Send mail via System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient isn't working on .NET MAUI Android, but on .NET MAUI Windows and Xamarin.Forms Android #74576
    8.0.0
  • Protection against assembly tampering #74569
  • HttpClient Response Stream hangs #74568
  • JIT: Reconsider setting GTF_GLOB_REF in gtNewFieldRef #74563
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'genTypeSize(fieldNode) == TARGET_POINTER_SIZE' during 'Generate code' #74562
    7.0.0
  • LoggerMessageGenerator and JsonSourceGenerator not using incremental generator caching #74557
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\cse\\hugeexpr1\\hugeexpr1.cmd #74555
  • .NET 6 vs .NET 7 reflection performance regression #74550
    7.0.0
  • Int128TestFieldLayout test failing on NativeAOT #74549
    8.0.0
  • HttpClientHandler.AllowAutoRedirect is not working as expected on servers #74548
  • Test failure GC\\Scenarios\\muldimjagary\\muldimjagary\\muldimjagary.cmd #74541
    7.0.0

Closed

  • MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCacheTest.Contains failed in CI #1429
  • SIMD problems when mixing llvm and non-llvm code #73454
    7.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tests.Perf_Timer.ScheduleManyThenDisposeMany has regressed on 64 bit Windows #67972
    7.0.0
  • Usage of memset with non-trivial types that results in -Wclass-memaccess #12684
    Future
  • Unnecessary(?) runtime lookups for constrained interface calls #73681
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in Exceptions.Handling #71069
    7.0.0
  • Assertion at /Users/runner/work/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/class-setup-vtable.c:1007, condition `is_ok (error)' not met, function:apply_override, VAR 1 (V) cannot be expanded in this context with 1 instantiations #70190
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Schema.Tests failures #74370
    7.0.0
  • Start time regressions on windows across many TE benchmarks #74315
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Tests Fails on iOS/tvOS #51398
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Tests fail on Android #50575
    Future
  • UTF-8 marshalling of string fields is broken #74394
    7.0.0
  • ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback(checkRevocation: True) failed on macOS 12 with RevocationStatusUnknown #74034
    8.0.0
  • Unable to Copy/Create file on NFS share on macOS #72786
    8.0.0
  • Implement proper File System detection for Apple OSes #69852
    Future
  • Cannot run tests outside of nativeaot folder #68394
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCacheTestExpires11/TimedExpirationAsync #1428
  • Memory corruption (EEE, AV, etc.) with GCStress and blank WF or WPF app #72321
    Future
  • Remove mscorlib references from CoreCLR #7358
    Future
  • Assert failed: System.Net.Http.Http3Connection.SendAsync in coreclr Linux_musl x64 Debug #74162
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][wbt] - Microsoft.Playwright.PlaywrightException : net::ERR_UNSAFE_PORT #72436
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update documentation for analyzing PR failures #74615
    area-Meta
  • For perf, remove Invoker pattern for fields #74614
    area-System.Reflection
  • `DisableRuntimeMarshalling` block Vector types #74612
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Fix native crashes and heap corruption #74611
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix typo in reflection test #74610
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Testing builds with v3beta pool - newer MacOS #74609
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing wasm.build.tests for net6, net7 workloads #74608
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Convert SHFileOperation error to Win IO error #74607
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, community-contribution
  • Do not remove certain casts with contained operands #74602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing reducing CI load #74601
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix XmlBinaryReader/XmlBinaryWriter on big-endian systems #74599
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Clean up SuperPMI collection scripts #74598
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Drop 6.0.200 workload manifests #74595
    area-codeflow, 6.0.x
  • Remove unneeded references to JsonTypeInfo.PropertyInfoForTypeInfo. #74594
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Show a warning when an explicit package reference to ILCompiler is added #74591
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Add Vector128 intrinsics for amd64 #74586
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Ensure that the result for PowMod is fully initialized #74585
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Enhance metrics reported by superpmi diffs #74584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fold SIMD-typed partial access to locals; delete base types from vector constants #74580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • #50870 Enabling Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Xml tests on android #74575
    os-android, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [Mono] Improve the performance of EqualsAll for Arm64 with LLVM as backend #74574
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Issue was that if a BGC thread handles a mark stack overflow, #74571
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions #74570
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • Use System.Numerics.IEqualityOperators.op_Equality in SpanHelper.T.cs where possible. #74567
    area-System.Memory, runtime-mono
  • [release/7.0] Implement proper File System detection for Apple OSes #74560
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • Add custom comparer to use incremental generator caching for LoggerMessageGenerator and JsonSourceGenerator #74558
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • #50878 enable StringSegment tests on Android #74556
    os-android, area-Extensions-Primitives
  • Don't crash compilation on invalid UnmanagedCallersOnly #74546
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • use msquic bits on all Windows platforms #74544
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Allow address == g_gc_highest_address in get_skewed_basic_region_index_for_address #74543
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Re-enable MemoryCacheTest.Contains. #74551
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 8.0.0
  • [mini] Disable passing valuetypes in SIMD registers #74582
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Disable ConnectWithRevocation_ServerCertWithoutContext_NoStapledOcsp on NativeAoT #74606
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/7.0] [mini] Disable passing valuetypes in SIMD registers #74592
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Bump Kerberos.NET version in tests #74600
    area-System.Net.Security
  • update Helix arm64 images #73963
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74539
    area-codeflow
  • [release/7.0] Allow SIMD-returning calls as arguments #74520
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reenable class-memaccess warning #74363
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Improve windows hardware exception handling performance #74590
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Add NuGet package for System.Runtime.Serialization.Schema #74597
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization
  • [release/7.0] Remove unnecessary runtime lookup for constrained callvirt #74523
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Only stack allocate when marshalling Utf8 arguments #74553
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable ConnectWithRevocation_ServerCertWithoutContext_NoStapledOcsp on NativeAoT #74561
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Attempt to reduce test build cost #74471
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Enable caching of writeable W^X mappings #74589
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix FormattingHelpers.CountDigits(UInt128) and add more tests for Int128/UInt128.ToString #74536
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/7.0] [mono] Assert that we don't need to inflate types when applying DIM overrides #74519
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0] [debugger][wasm] Fixes trying to evaluate a debugger helper function in a non-wasm page. #74458
    area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Bump Kerberos.NET version in tests #74554
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Add NuGet package for System.Runtime.Serialization.Schema #74533
    area-Serialization
  • [release/7.0] Don't re-use XmlSchemaSet - it's not threadsafe. #74564
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • enable SendMailAsync_CanBeCanceled_CancellationToken test #74545
    area-System.Net
  • [release/7.0] Disable distributed transaction tests on ARM #74573
    area-System.Transactions
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Move all build pools to -Svc equivalents #74521
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Bump branding to RC2 #74515
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Disable distributed transaction tests on ARM #74572
    area-System.Transactions
  • Enable caching of writeable W^X mappings #74526
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Allow AsLPArray test to succeed without COM #74552
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [wasm] Move all the wasm jobs from runtime-staging to runtime #73596
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Switch to unified fully managed Overlapped implementation #74532
    area-System.Threading
  • Add server1.pfx to CredScanSuppressions.json #74559
    area-Infrastructure
  • #50575 colorbehavior default should disable colors in android/applemobile #74496
    os-android, os-ios, area-Extensions-Logging, os-tvos
  • Only stack allocate when marshalling Utf8 arguments #74478
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't re-use XmlSchemaSet - it's not threadsafe. #74524
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • Implement proper File System detection for Apple OSes #74493
    area-System.IO
  • Fix building CLR test tree #74547
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] gRPC client tests #73060
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Working with StressLogAnalyzer I found yet another issue where we are… #74491
  • Fix a buffer overrun in GC structures #74540
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove all non-functional/non-informational uses of mscorlib. #74529
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Test, and app host fixes #74512
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Assert that we don't need to inflate types when applying DIM overrides #74379
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Adapt System.CommandLine (v2) in more places #72082
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cross-compile cross-compilers for non-x64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Fix signature for 64-bit delegate profiling helper #74500
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Collect SPMI for TechEmpower benchmarks #74420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Assertion prop instrumentation #73035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • CI: Tighten the path based triggers for jobs #74534
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Android][libs] Introduce GetLocalUtcOffset temporary fast result #74459
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Determine any memory/CPU limitations from sysfs cgroup #74237
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] SIMD support improvements #73289
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [release/6.0] Add signing infrastructure for diagnostic binaries #74330
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • Try to make tests faster2 #74530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Non-canonical NaN tests for Vector Equals method (Issue #68710) #74517
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Do not retype small locals in `FIELD_LIST`s on x86 #74030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Forward-substitute long calls on 32 bit targets #74502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Delete some unnecessary code #74527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions #74226
    area-System.Transactions, 8.0.0
  • Update fabricbot.json for Tellurium team #74480
    area-Meta
  • Add support for indefinite length arrays #74215
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix chinese character in project name #74516
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add intrinsic for IndexOfAny on Arm64 #74010
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [RateLimiting] Handle Timer jitter #74360
    area-System.Threading
  • add a null pointer guard around a usage of comp->vnStore #73958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: extend copy prop to local fields #74384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Simplify platform macro definitions in PAL #73530
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0][mono][jit] Don't memset memory in increments lower than word size #74351
    Servicing-approved, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.x
  • Prevent pooled byte buffer writer index from overflowing #74511
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Root listener/connection while waiting on new connection/stream event #74450
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Remove GT_NULLCHECK #71707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Clone all local addresses when importing `dup` #72714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • fix MaxResponseHeadersLength tests #74479
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Simplify JitDisasm matching behavior #74430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: strategy for PRs for RyuJIT with optimisations on #1964

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Allow `RyuJitCompilation` to turn off tail calls #1966

Merged

  • Test infrastructure integration #1963

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Creating a dotnet tool with multiple executables #27459
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc]With .NET 7 rc1 installed, the texts in CLI are partly unlocalzied after running "dotnet workload search". #27447
  • "CreateAppHost" task failed unexpectedly (MacOS) - Could not set file permission 493 #27436

Closed

  • Icon for dotnet-CLI #24578
  • [ApiCompat] Add a feature flag to enable the AttributeMustMatch rule #27453

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test for framework trimming warnings #27461
    Area-ILLink
  • Added `new` to the list of commands to track the second verb #27457
    area: dotnet new
  • Moved the options to new \ new create level #27455
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1967771 #27439
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27438
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add test for trimming warnings in 5.0 app #27460
    Area-ILLink
  • Update dotnet tool update description. #27458
    Area-Tools
  • Move 7.0.1xx (sans eng/common) to -Svc build pools #27426
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Build 7.0.1xx branches internally #27465
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add EnableRuleAttributesMustMatch switch #27454
    Area-ApiCompat
  • ApiCompat/AttributesMustMatch: add test case for attributes with array and type arguments #27431
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Move non-eng-common builds to NetCore1ESPool-Svc-* version #27425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet new tests refactoring #27333
    area: dotnet new

Updated

  • emit diagnostic for adding sealed to interface member #27421
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update AO test #27334
    Area-ILLink
  • Add error when failing to resolve SDK with workload sdk resolver #27432
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 7.0.1xx

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-25
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Add RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #6382

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow Targets to be specified when loading a MSBuildWorkspace #63605
  • C# goto label indentation setting not working correctly #63601
  • API needed for accessing project context name #63597
    17.4
  • Bad completion of `nullable` keyword #63594
  • `Convert to raw string` refactoring is available for incompatible C# versions #63592
  • Analyzer throws warning RS1022 while creating a new AdhocWorkspace() #63589
  • Build fails for transitive nuget references, introduced in 17.3 #63596
  • [Regression] Navigating to error messages no longer switches context #63586

Closed

  • Consider filtering `RequiredMembers` attribute in compiler layer/API #61511
    17.4
  • Immediate Window has a data acquisition fault #61558
  • Compiler crashes in EditAndContinueMethodDebugInformation.SerializeStateMachineStates #61913
  • Compiler should error for `ModuleInitializer` on `static abstract` member #63481
    Backlog
  • "Inline temporary variable" suggests complete deletion of a variable #63587

PullRequests

Created

  • Add stages to the Roslyn CI #63607
  • Simplify RecoverableText #63606
    Area-IDE
  • Use 'checked' names for synthesized vb intrinsic operators #63604
    Area-Compilers
  • Update NuGet version to fix MSBuildWorkspace tests #63603
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update 17 3 packages #63599
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Experiminting with test execution limits #63595
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not show "Convert to raw string" refactoring for C# version lower than 11 #63593
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support rename and resolve multiple symbols in one solution snapshot #63588

Merged

  • Change cancel behavior for rename #63600
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63554
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch our statistics mean to be a double #63602
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Filter out `RequiredMemberAttribute` from metadata symbols #63497
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1962551 #63548
  • Disable targeting windows for source-build #63598
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Send Document outline telemetry #63575
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove waiting for background task from more command handlers #63571
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow Roslyn to access any evaluation properties #62445
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Disallow ModuleInitializer attribute on abstract/virtual static methods. #63568
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Remove BranchId from the workspace. #63578
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable new inline rename by default #62992
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63609
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove the single-symbol assumption in ConflictResolver Session #63150
    Area-IDE
  • Inheritance of base positional records #63525
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • make roslyn solution default on unix #63566
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add Target-type Conversion Errors for Lambdas with Default Parameters #63448
    Area-Compilers
  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Semantic Snippets - Command Handler tests #63581
    Area-IDE
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • Move Windows builds to new images #63482
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update versions of external packages we reference #63544
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #63496
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Semantic Snippets - fix tabstop location for cursor in blocks #63519
    Area-IDE
  • Hovering in .editorconfig files #63188
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix post init trees parsing when parse options change #61934
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Priority:0
  • Expose IsGeneratedCode boolean property on diagnostic analyzer contexts #63447
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Incremental Generators docs update #63500
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Editorconfig diagnostics #63580
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move to -Svc pool provider in release branches #63584
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Authorize attribute with AllowAnonymous attribute always anonymous. #43550
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #43549
  • Quarantine Http3.Http3TlsTests.OnAuthenticate_Available_Throws #43548
  • TryParse parameter binding breaks if IParsable is explicitly implemented #43546
  • EndpointBuilder.ApplicationServices should use `init` instead of `set` #43544
    7.0-rc2
  • When I install the ASP Core as windows service I can't connect to my gRPC service #43547
  • Blazor: get currently focused element #43541
  • Hot reload no longer works in dotnet CLI #43540
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #43538

Closed

  • Blazor Server SPA is returning 'Soft 404' error while accessing an URL/page directly from SEO crawler #43075
  • Uncatchable Exception While Using IFormFile Object Streams #43424
  • Requests using the absolute-form in the request line require the host to match #39335
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Feature] Blazor QuickGrid add the ability to be able to export all data or filtered data to a pdf , csv, html #43499
  • Can't build docker image for ASP.NET Core + React #43514
  • How to host an ASP Core .NET 6 application in a windows service? #43527
  • Reload Blazor UI #43370
  • Blazor Server - NotAuthorized content is shown before Authorization is finished #43492
  • Blazor WASM web app doesn't work properly in Firefox #43516

PullRequests

Created

  • Update sdk with arcade 10585 #43555
  • [release/6.0] Remove Windows.10.Amd64.Server20H2.Open #43554
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Skip output caching for keys with delimiters #43553
    area-runtime
  • [SignalR] Fix bug when combining streaming and client results #43552
    area-signalr
  • [SignalR] Avoid unobserved tasks in the .NET client #43545
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net
  • [release/7.0] Add and use RDF.InferMetadata and update new PopulateMetadata API #43543
    7.0-rc2
  • Add pointerenter/leave to nonBubblingEvents #43542
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Unquarantine ClientCertificate_Allow_NotAvailable_Optional #43537
    area-runtime
  • Unquarantine ClientCertificate_Required_NotSent_AcceptedViaCallback #43536
    area-runtime
  • Unquarantine WebHostTests.UseUrls_HelloWorld_ClientSuccess #43535
    area-runtime
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #43534
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43533
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution

Merged

  • Quarantine OnAuthenticate_Available_Throws #43551
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0-rc1] HTTP/3 flaky test retries and logging #43423
    area-runtime
  • Remove the double dispatch on Windows for IO #43449
    area-runtime
  • Move to -Svc pool provider (release/7.0) #43529
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonScalarExpression: Remove jsonColumnMadeNullable #28887
  • Sqlite: Using column from table being updated in left join predicate generates invalid SQL #28886
  • Allow conventions to react to annotation changes without using internal code #28883
  • Consider migrating all of the msbuild files from the current nuget packages to an msbuild sdk. #28882
  • Consider removing unnecessary CASTs around JSON_VALUE #28881
  • Multiple Contexts and Transactions #28880
  • Datatable Load seems to take far too long to execute. #28879

Closed

  • JSON: add support for partial update to update just a single scalar property, rather than entire entities #28845
    7.0.0-rc1
  • How to properly migrate column from nullable to non-nullable #28849
  • Stored procs with TPH doesn't work with multiple subtypes #28805
    7.0.0
  • Exception: "An item with the same key has already been added" in stored proc validation #28804
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow making a column non-nullable with SQL Server #28890
  • Query: Change JSONQuery.Path to be list of PathSegment #28888

Merged

  • Merge release/7.0-rc1 to release/7.0 #28885
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw from 2.1.0 to 2.1.1-pre20220822172036 #28884
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Scaffolding: Avoid recompiling T4 templates #28872
  • Fix to #28845 - JSON: add support for partial update to update just a single scalar property, rather than entire entities #28862
    tell-mode
  • Move to -Svc pool provider in release branches (7.0 RC1) #28874
  • Move to -Svc pool provider in release branches #28873
  • Fix sproc TPH mapping #28875
  • Fix logic in TPT sproc validation where the root type is abstract #28877

Updated

  • Stop scaffolding DbSet initializers #28684
